mdRecord.dcterms:title: Plečnik House, exterior|general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Plečnik, Jože (Slovene architect, 1872-1957) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Visitors to Plečnik House can view the master architect's authentic interiors, which include a glassed porch, a kitchen, a corridor, a bedroom with an en suite bathroom, a small reception room, a staircase to the first floor, a studio, a conservatory and a large garden to the west of the house. -- http://www.slovenia.info/?arhitekturne_znamenitosti=12281 [work]
